titleStmt.title: The life-guard of a loyall Christian, described in a sermon, preached at St Peters Corn-hill, upon Sunday in the afternoone, May 7. 1648. / By Paul Knell, Master in Arts of Clare-Hall in Cambridge: sometimes chaplaine to a regiment of curiasiers in his Majesties Army.
titleStmt.author: Knell, Paul, 1615?-1664.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
